config.villagerfix.title: VillagerFix Config
config.villagerfix.maxdiscount.tooltip: The highest possible price discount a villager can give on it's default trade price
config.villagerfix.conversionchance.tool: The chance of a villager to converting to a villagerzombie (-1 = vanilla behaviour)
config.villagerfix.maxraise.tooltip: The highest possible price raise a villager can give on it's default trade price (100 = vanilla, 0 = none)
config.villagerfix.maxuses.tooltip: Defines how high the max usages should be (100 = vanilla, 200 = 2 x more than vanilla)
config.villagerfix.lock.tooltip: Whether or not villagers should be locked to a profession once they claim it (false = vanilla)
config.villagerfix.blacklisted_trades.to: Blacklist trades (this only effects newly generated trades). Example values: minecraft:stick, minecraft:clay, minecraft:pumpkin
config.villagerfix.enabled.tooltip: Whether or not https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Trading/Before_Village_%26_Pillage#Mechanics should be used for trade (un)locking
config.villagerfix.minuses.tooltip: The minimum amount of trades possible after which it can get locked (1.12 default: 2)
config.villagerfix.maxuses2.tooltip: The maximum amount of trades possible, if reached a trade is guaranteed to get locked (1.12 default: 12)
config.villagerfix.lockchance.tooltip: The chance of a trade locking itself (1.12 default: 20)
config.villagerfix.unlockchance.tooltip: The chance of a trade unlocking all other trades (1.12 default: 20)
